name: Peggy's Cove Morning Light Tour
description: Let's photograph Peggy's Cove, one of Canada's most iconic sites with the beautiful dawn rising up over the North Atlantic. Picture Perfect Tours will pick up you and your group bright and early for a unique morning experience photographing the majestic Peggy's Cove Preservation Area. Our licensed transport takes you from Halifax to Peggy's Cove to have everyone there just as the sun is up with the beautiful golden hour light in the morning.
